mapper.sql: id, device_type, device_code, device_version, serial_number, system_version, time, create_by, create_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_s_error_log (id, device_type, device_code, device_version, serial_number, system_version, time, create_by, create_date, error_message) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{errorMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into t_s_error_log
id,
device_type,
device_code,
device_version,
serial_number,
system_version,
time,
create_by,
create_date,
error_message,

mapper.update:
update t_s_error_log
device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_version = #{deviceVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
system_version = #{systemVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
error_message = #{errorMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE t_s_error_log SET device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_version = #{deviceVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, system_version = #{systemVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, error_message = #{errorMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE t_s_error_log SET device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_version = #{deviceVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, system_version = #{systemVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT tsel.id, tsel.device_type, tsel.error_message, tsel.device_code, tsel.device_version, tsel.serial_number, tsel.system_version, tsel.time, tsel.create_date, tsu.user_name AS createName FROM t_s_error_log tsel LEFT JOIN t_s_user tsu ON tsel.create_by = tsu.id
ORDER BY tsel.time DESC LIMIT #{rowOffset}, #{pageSize}

where.if: ( tsu.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{obj.keyword}, '%') or tsel.error_message LIKE CONCAT('%', #{obj.keyword}, '%') )

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS rowTotal FROM t_s_error_log tsel LEFT JOIN t_s_user tsu ON tsel.create_by = tsu.id
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM t_s_error_log ORDER BY device_type ASC
